member.name: M:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Win32.Gdi32.Escape(System.Int64,System.Int64,System.Int64,System.String@,System.Object)
member.summary: The Escape function allows applications to access capabilities of a particular device not directly available through GDI. Escape calls made by an application are translated and sent to the driver
member.param: Specifies the escape function to be performed. This parameter must be one of the predefined escape values. Use the ExtEscape function if your application defines a private escape value.
Specifies the number of bytes of data pointed to by the lpvInData parameter.
Points to the input structure required for the specified escape.

Points to the structure that receives output from this escape. This parameter should be NULL if no data is returned
If the function succeeds, the return value is greater than zero, except with the QUERYESCSUPPORT printer escape, which checks for implementation only. If the escape is not implemented, the return value is zero.
If the function fails, the return value is an error. To get extended error information, call GetLastError.

member.name: M:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Win32.Kernel32.Sleep(System.Int64)
member.summary: Sleep pauses program execution for a certain amount of time. This is more accurate than using a do-nothing loop, waiting for a certain amount of time to pass. The function does not return a value.
member.param: The number of milliseconds to halt program execution for.

member.name: M:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Win32.ComDlg32.CommDlgExtendedError
member.summary: CommDlgExtendedError returns the error code from the last common dialog box function. This function does not return error codes for any other API function; for that, use GetLastError instead.
member.returns: The function's return value is undefined if the last common dialog function call was successful. If an error with a common dialog function did occur, the return value is exactly one of the following common dialog error flags:

member.name: F:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Win32.ComDlg32.CDERR_DIALOGFAILURE
member.summary: The function could not open the dialog box.

member.name: F:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Win32.ComDlg32.CDERR_FINDRESFAILURE
member.summary: The function failed to find the desired resource.

member.name: F:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Win32.ComDlg32.CDERR_GENERALCODES
member.summary: The error involved a general common dialog box property.

member.name: F:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Win32.ComDlg32.CDERR_INITIALIZATION
member.summary: The function failed during initialization (probably insufficient memory).

member.name: F:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Win32.ComDlg32.CDERR_LOADRESFAILURE
member.summary: The function failed to load the desired resource.

member.name: F:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Win32.ComDlg32.CDERR_LOADSTRFAILURE
member.summary: The function failed to load the desired string.

member.name: F:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Win32.ComDlg32.CDERR_LOCKRESFAILURE
member.summary: The function failed to lock the desired resource.

member.name: F:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Win32.ComDlg32.CDERR_MEMALLOCFAILURE
member.summary: The function failed to allocate sufficient memory.

member.name: F:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Win32.ComDlg32.CDERR_MEMLOCKFAILURE
member.summary: The function failed to lock the desired memory.

member.name: F:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Win32.ComDlg32.CDERR_NOHINSTANCE
member.summary: The function was not provided with a valid instance handle (if one was required).

member.name: F:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Win32.ComDlg32.CDERR_NOHOOK
member.summary: The function was not provided with a valid hook function handle (if one was required).

member.name: F:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Win32.ComDlg32.CDERR_NOTEMPLATE
member.summary: The function was not provided with a valid template (if one was required).

member.name: F:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Win32.ComDlg32.CDERR_REGISTERMSGFAIL
member.summary: The function failed to successfully register a window message.

member.name: F:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Win32.ComDlg32.CDERR_STRUCTSIZE
member.summary: The function was provided with an invalid structure size.

member.name: F:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Win32.ComDlg32.CFERR_CHOOSEFONTCODES
member.summary: The error involved the Choose Font common dialog box.

member.name: F:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Win32.ComDlg32.CFERR_MAXLESSTHANMIN
member.summary: The function was provided with a maximum font size value smaller than the provided minimum font size.

member.name: F:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Win32.ComDlg32.CFERR_NOFONTS
member.summary: The function could not find any existing fonts.

member.name: F:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Win32.ComDlg32.FNERR_BUFFERTOOSMALL
member.summary: The function was provided with a filename buffer which was too small.

member.name: F:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Win32.ComDlg32.FNERR_FILENAMECODES
member.summary: The error involved the Open File or Save File common dialog box.

member.name: F:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Win32.ComDlg32.FNERR_INVALIDFILENAME
member.summary: The function was provided with or received an invalid filename.

member.name: F:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Win32.ComDlg32.FNERR_SUBCLASSFAILURE
member.summary: The function had insufficient memory to subclass the list box.

member.name: F:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Win32.ComDlg32.FRERR_BUFFERLENGTHZERO
member.summary: The function was provided with an invalid buffer.

member.name: F:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Win32.ComDlg32.FRERR_FINDREPLACECODES
member.summary: The error involved the Find or Replace common dialog box.

member.name: F:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Win32.ComDlg32.PDERR_CREATEICFAILURE
member.summary: The function failed to create an information context.

member.name: F:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Win32.ComDlg32.PDERR_DEFAULTDIFFERENT
member.summary: The function was told that the information provided described the default printer, but the default printer's actual settings were different.

member.name: F:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Win32.ComDlg32.PDERR_DNDMMISMATCH
member.summary: The data in the two data structures describe different printers (i.e., they hold conflicting information).

member.name: F:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Win32.ComDlg32.PDERR_GETDEVMODEFAIL
member.summary: The printer driver failed to initialize the DEVMODE structure.

member.name: F:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Win32.ComDlg32.PDERR_INITFAILURE
member.summary: The function failed during initialization.

member.name: F:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Win32.ComDlg32.PDERR_LOADDRVFAILURE
member.summary: The function failed to load the desired device driver.

member.name: F:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Win32.ComDlg32.PDERR_NODEFAULTPRN
member.summary: The function could not find a default printer.

member.name: F:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Win32.ComDlg32.PDERR_NODEVICES
member.summary: The function could not find any printers.

member.name: F:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Win32.ComDlg32.PDERR_PARSEFAILURE
member.summary: The function failed to parse the printer-related strings in WIN.INI.

member.name: F:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Win32.ComDlg32.PDERR_PRINTERCODES
member.summary: The error involved the Print common dialog box.

member.name: F:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Win32.ComDlg32.PDERR_PRINTERNOTFOUND
member.summary: The function could not find information in WIN.INI about the requested printer.

member.name: F:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Win32.ComDlg32.PDERR_RETDEFFAILURE
member.summary: The handles to the data structures provided were nonzero even though the function was asked to return information about the default printer.

member.name: F:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Win32.ComDlg32.PDERR_SETUPFAILURE
member.summary: The function failed to load the desired resources.
